purpleculture_pinyin:
bāng
to help; to assist; to support; for sb (i.e. as a help); hired (as worker); side (of pail, boat etc); outer layer; upper (of a shoe); group; gang; clique; party; secret society
помочь; помогать; поддерживать; для sb (т.е. как помощь); наемный (как рабочий); бортик (ведра, лодки и т. д.); Наружный слой; верхний (ботинка); группа; банда; клика; партия; секретное общество

heisig_chinese_memo: To help trick burglars you seal your diamonds in a white bath towel out in the open. It's too obvious to check.
Ru_trainchinese:
bāng: (глаг) помогать
bāng: (сущ/сч.слово) толпа, шайка; тайное общество; группировка, группа (людей)
bāng: (сущ) бок, сторона (обычно полого предмета); наружные листья (капусты)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you seal (封) the white turban (帛) to help it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Within the city walls there is no lack of help.  Bushes help you breathe fresh air and towels are offered at all of the gyms and bathhouses.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " silk " and " seal ", the original meaning is the side part of the shoe. "Guang Yun‧ Ping Tang": "Help, clothing and shoes." Song Jiang Jie "Liu Shaoqing‧ Younv": "Liu Yuhua wind, green pine skirt pleats, red greasy upper."

" Bang " can be extended to the sides or surrounding parts of certain objects. "Lao Can's Travels" Chapter 1: "There are many people on the bow and on the boat, like sailors."

" Bang " also means moving closer and closer. "Water Margin" Chapter 19: "Du Qian, Song Wan, and Zhu Gui were going to come forward and persuade them, but they were tightly helped by them, so they dared to move there."

" Bang " can also mean help and help. Yuan Wuming's "Qiyingbu" 1st fold: "If you do not succeed in this trip, wait for me to help you."

" Bang " can also be used as a quantifier to indicate partnership or group. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 49: "The two parents are here to help.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " silk " and " seal ", the original meaning is the side part of the shoe.
humanum_full_description:
從「帛」，「封」聲，本義為鞋的側面部分。《廣韻‧平唐》：「幫，衣治鞋履。」宋蔣捷〈柳梢青‧游女〉：「柳雨花風，翠鬆裙褶，紅膩鞋幫。」

　　「幫」可引申為某些物體兩旁或周圍的部分。《老殘游記》第1回：「船頭及船幫上有許多的人，彷彿水手的打扮。」

　　「幫」也表示靠攏、挨近。《水滸傳》第19回：「杜遷、宋萬、朱貴本待要向前來勸，被這幾個緊緊幫着，那裏敢動。」

　　「幫」還可表示幫助、幫襯。元無名氏《氣英布》第1摺：「你這一去若不得成功，等我來幫你。」

　　「幫」亦可用作量詞，表示伙、群。《紅樓夢》第49回：「兩親家一處搭幫來了。」
humanum_short_description: 從「帛」，「封」聲，本義為鞋的側面部分。

①輔助：幫助。幫忙。幫襯。幫手。幫辦(ａ．指幫助主管人員辦公務；b．指主管人員的助手)。幫傭。
②羣，夥：幫夥。幫派。
③集團：幫會(舊時民間的祕密組織，簡稱“幫”，如“青幫”、“紅幫”)。
④物體兩旁或周圍的部分：船幫。鞋幫兒。
⑤量詞，用於人，“羣、夥”的意思：一幫人。

Meaning: help

Story: Within the city walls there is no lack of help. Bushes help you breathe fresh air and towels are offered at all of the gyms and bathhouses.
Kind: traditional
從「 帛 」，「 封 」聲，本義為鞋的側面部分。《廣韻‧平唐》：「幫，衣治鞋履。」宋蔣捷〈柳梢青‧游女〉：「柳雨花風，翠鬆裙褶，紅膩鞋幫。」 「 幫 」可引申為某些物體兩旁或周圍的部分。《老殘游記》第1回：「船頭及船幫上有許多的人，彷彿水手的打扮。」 「 幫 」也表示靠攏、挨近。《水滸傳》第19回：「杜遷、宋萬、朱貴本待要向前來勸，被這幾個緊緊幫着，那裏敢動。」 「 幫 」還可表示幫助、幫襯。元無名氏《氣英布》第1摺：「你這一去若不得成功，等我來幫你。」 「 幫 」亦可用作量詞，表示伙、群。《紅樓夢》第49回：「兩親家一處搭幫來了。」
From the sound of " silk" and " seal", the original meaning is the side part of the shoe. "Guang Yun‧ Ping Tang": "Help, clothing and shoes." Song Jiang Jie "Liu Shaoqing‧ Younv": "Liu Yuhua wind, green pine skirt pleats, red greasy upper." " Bang" can be extended to the sides or surrounding parts of certain objects. "Lao Can's Travels" Chapter 1: "There are many people on the bow and on the boat, like sailors." " Bang" also means moving closer and closer. "Water Margin" Chapter 19: "Du Qian, Song Wan, and Zhu Gui were going to come forward and persuade them, but they were tightly helped by them, so they dared to move there." " Bang" can also mean help and help. Yuan Wuming's "Qiyingbu" 1st fold: "If you do not succeed in this trip, wait for me to help you." " Bang" can also be used as a quantifier to indicate partnership or group. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 49: "The two parents are here to help.

幫字的基本解释

幫
bāng
见“帮”。

幫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bāng］
［《廣韻》博旁切，平唐，幫。］
亦作“幇1”。亦作“幚1”。亦作“1”。“帮1”的繁体字。亦作“鞤1”。
(1)鞋的侧面部分。
(2)引申为某些物体两旁或周围的部分。
(3)增补；增加。
(4)靠拢；挨近。
(5)帮助；帮衬。
(6)伙；群。
(7)为某种目的而结合起来的团体。以地区结合的，如广东帮，福建帮。以职业结合的，如茶帮，丝帮。亦指帮会。

幫字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幫； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页337第23
【廣韻】【正韻】博旁切【集韻】逋旁切，?音幇。【廣韻】幫衣，治絲履。【集韻】治履邊也。【六書故】幫，裨帖也。省作幇。凡事物旁取者皆曰幫。

幫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幫字的起名意思

暂无。

bāng
See "help".
help
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bāng］
["Guangyun" Bo Fangqie, Ping Tang, Bang. ]
Also known as "幇1". Also known as "幚1". Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "帮1". Also known as "鞤1".
(1) The side part of the shoe.
(2) It is extended to the parts on both sides or surroundings of certain objects.
(3) Supplement; increase.
(4) Move closer; get closer.
(5) Help; help lining.
(6) Group; group.
(7) A group combined for a certain purpose. The combination of regions, such as the Guangdong Gang and the Fujian Gang. Combination of occupations, such as tea gang, silk gang. Also refers to the gang.
help

[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　bang; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 337 23
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Bo next to cut [Ji Yun] next to cut,? Yin 幇. [Guangyun] Helping clothes and treating silk shoes. 【Ji Yun】It is also to control the side. [Liu Shu Gu] Help, Pi Tie also. Province Zuoqiang. All those who take things beside are called to help.
